DOC.brief_summary: This current project investigates the effect of a single session of right dlPFC repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation on emotion regulation abilities and craving in alcohol dependent patients and healthy controls.
DOC.brief_title: Changing the Vulnerable Brain: A Neuromodulation Study in Alcohol Dependence
